tool.name: iTraq4plex analysis via X-Tracker
tool.description: Execute iTraq4plex quantitation method via X-Tracker
tool.help: X-Tracker is a PSI-standards-compliant software framework for supporting mass spectrometry-based protein quantitation. Through an abstraction of the main steps involved in quantitation, X-Tracker should technically be able to support quantitation by means of all the current protocols, both at MS1 and/or MS2 level, and provide a flexible, platform-independent quantitation environment. More details can be found at http://www.x-tracker.info/. This tool demonstrates the ability of X-Tracker to do an iTraq-4plex analyses.

<!--1:1--> <SoftwareList> <Software id="x-Tracker" version="2.0-ALPHA"> <cvParam accession="MS:1002123" cvRef="PSI-MS" name="x-Tracker"/> </Software> </SoftwareList>
<!--1:1--> <DataProcessingList> <DataProcessing id="DP1" software_ref="x-Tracker" order="1"> <!--used as xtracker configuration file--> <ProcessingMethod order="1"> <userParam name="Plugin type" value="load identification"/> #if $identification.identification_type == "mzid" <userParam name="Plugin name" value="loadMzIdentML"/> <userParam name="Plugin configuration file" value="$mzid"/> #else <userParam name="Plugin name" value="loadMascotIdent"/> <userParam name="Plugin configuration file" value="$mascot"/> #end if </ProcessingMethod>
<ProcessingMethod order="2"> <userParam name="Plugin type" value="load raw spectra"/> #if $spectra.spectra_type == "mzml" <userParam name="Plugin name" value="loadRawMzML111"/> #else <userParam name="Plugin name" value="loadRawMGF"/> #end if </ProcessingMethod>
<ProcessingMethod order="3"> <userParam name="Plugin type" value="feature detection and quantitation"/> <userParam name="Plugin name" value="iTraqQuantitation"/> <userParam name="Plugin configuration file" value="$quant"/> <!--define the inference methods, which must be the value in the set "mean","median","sum","weightedAverage"--> <userParam name="Feature to peptide inference method" value="mean"/> <userParam name="Peptide to protein inference method" value="weightedAverage"/> <!--<userParam name="Protein to protein group inference method" value="sum"/>--> <userParam name="Assay to Study Variables inference method" value="sum"/> <userParam name="Protein ratio calculation infer from peptide ratio" value="true"/> </ProcessingMethod> <ProcessingMethod order="4"> <userParam name="Plugin type" value="Output"/> <userParam name="Plugin name" value="outputMZQ"/> <userParam name="Plugin configuration file" value="$out"/> </ProcessingMethod>
</DataProcessing> </DataProcessingList>
